The vertical wafer boat includes a plurality of columns, being made of SiC-based material having a SiC coating film on a surface thereof, which contains shelf plate portions for supporting wafers, and a top plate and a bottom plate for fixing upper and lower ends of the columns, wherein a supporting plane which is in contact with an outer peripheral portion of the wafer is provided on an upper surface of the shelf plate portion, and a surface roughness Ra of a lower surface of the shelf plate increases toward a front side of the shelf plate portion from a rear side.
